MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY6 postcode area of Glenrothes. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:49pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations are required on the electrical network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:54 PM on Thursday, 25 March 2021.
